800 
 
UNN         
  
   d. NCE credit in a Social Science subject from a recognised 
College of Education. In addition, candidates should have 
at least an overall merit.  
(iii)  LAGOS accepts  
a. very good passes in three (3) JUPEB/’A’ -level subjects   
Any three (3) of Economics, Government, Geography, 
History and Christian Religious Studies/ Islamic Studies.  
b. ND Social Development and Administration   (SDA) with 
one year post qualification experience.  
    
  
UTME  
(i) LAGOS requires 'O' level credit passes in English Language,  
 Mathematics,  and  any  two  (2)  of  Economics,  
Government/History, Civic Education and Geography and one 
of Literature in English, Christian Religious Studies/ Islamic 
Studies, any Nigerian Language and Biology.  
(ii) UNN requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes which must include 
English Language and any four (4) Arts or Social Science 
Subjects.  
(iii) REDEEMERS requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to include 
English Language, Mathematics and three (3) subjects in Social 
Sciences or Arts.  
(iv) CALABAR same as in Sociology.  
(v) BENIN requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to include English 
Language, Mathematics, Economics, Government, Geography 
or any other Social Science subject.  
  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(I)  LAGOS requires two (2) Social Science subjects and one Arts 
subject. Mathematics is also accepted.  
(ii) CALABAR and UNN require any three (3) Social Science or Arts 
Subjects.  
(iii) BENIN requires two (2) Social Science subjects and any other 
subject.
